attributes.comment:
To Whom it Concerns,

I would like to voice my strong objection to the proposed increase in adoption fees
as put forth in this proposal. I am writing on behalf of two young families who have
generously decided to open their homes to children.
The proposed increases are substantial. The cost of raising a family in current
times makes it difficult enough to provide well for these children in need of a good
home. If additional funds are necessary, surely there must be alternative
mechanisms versus placing the burden on those who would adopt a needy child
into their homes and families.
I ask all involved in the decision-making process to please reconsider,
understanding that these adoptive parents need support rather than face a
significant increase in the cost to help these children, and rescind these proposed
fee increases.

Sincerely,
Phil Bryson

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Phil Bryson
